subject: Confirmation link
body:
Your credit score does not matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE pin money to spend ANY way you like, or simply require to LOWER your monthly payments by a third or more, here is our deal we can offer you TODAY (hurry, this tender will expire THIS EVENING):
$461,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest entire payment!
Hurry, when best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill this elementary form... 
Don't worry about approval, your your credit report will not disqualify you!!
http://bgyrqybox.com/
